interface.name: StringReference
interface.javadoc:
A string object from the target VM. A StringReference is an {@link ObjectReference} with additional access to string-specific information from the target VM.
Robert Field
Gordon Hirsch
James McIlree
1.3

Returns the StringReference as a String. The returned string is the equivalent of the mirrored string, but is an entity in the client VM and can be manipulated like any other string.
the string value.
